trans-unit.source: Provides data for the CustomizeMapAreas event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料的 CustomizeMapAreas 事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This class provides data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeMapAreas> event of the Chart control.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別提供資料給<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeMapAreas>Chart 控制項的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeMapAreas>

trans-unit.source: The only property of this class is the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs.MapAreaItems%2A>s property, which enables developers to: - Delete or customize map areas that have been created for a chart object; any <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> object that has a non-empty `Url`, `MapAreaAttributes` or `ToolTip` property will have an associated map area object.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的唯一屬性是<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs.MapAreaItems%2A>s 屬性，可讓開發人員:-刪除，或自訂對應區域尚未建立圖表物件; 任何<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine>具有非空白的物件`Url`，`MapAreaAttributes`或`ToolTip`屬性會有相關聯的地圖區域物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs.MapAreaItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Add custom map areas that have a user-defined shape and coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 新增具有使用者定義的形狀和座標的自訂地圖區域。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified map areas collection.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs"></xref>類別與指定的對應區域集合。

trans-unit.source: Can be used to remove or modify map areas that correspond to a chart object, or to add custom map areas.
trans-unit.target: 可用來移除或修改圖表的物件相對應的對應區域，或加入自訂對應區域。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to: - Delete or customize map areas that have been created for a chart object; any <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> object that has a non-empty `Url`, `MapAreaAttributes` or `ToolTip` property will have an associated map area object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您:-刪除，或自訂對應區域建立圖表物件。任何<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>， <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine>具有非空白的物件`Url`，`MapAreaAttributes`或`ToolTip`屬性會有相關聯的地圖區域物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>

trans-unit.source: - Add custom map areas that have a user-defined shape and coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 新增具有使用者定義的形狀和座標的自訂地圖區域。
